# Simple Language Grammar Reference

*Generated by `bin/simple grammar-doc` from `doc/spec/grammar/grammar_keywords.sdn`.*

---

## Keywords

| Keyword | Category | Description | Example |
|---------|----------|-------------|---------|
| `fn` | declarations | Function definition | `fn square(x: i64) -> i64: x * x` |
| `val` | declarations | Immutable binding | `val name = "Alice"` |
| `var` | declarations | Mutable binding | `var count = 0` |
| `struct` | declarations | Struct definition | `struct Point: x: i64; y: i64` |
| `enum` | declarations | Enum definition | `enum Color: Red; Green; Blue` |
| `class` | declarations | Class definition (struct with methods) | `class Dog: name: text` |
| `impl` | declarations | Method implementation block | `impl Point: fn len(): ...` |
| `extern` | declarations | External function declaration (FFI) | `extern fn rt_print(s: text)` |
| `use` | declarations | Module import | `use std.math.{sqrt, abs}` |
| `export` | declarations | Symbol export | `export my_fn, MyType` |
| `import` | declarations | Module import (deprecated, use use) |  |
| `trait` | declarations | Trait definition | `trait Printable: fn print():` |
| `pub` | declarations | Public visibility modifier |  |
| `static` | declarations | Static method or binding |  |
| `me` | declarations | Mutable self method |  |
| `type` | declarations | Type alias |  |
| `implements` | declarations | Trait implementation declaration |  |
| `const` | declarations | Compile-time constant |  |
| `mod` | declarations | Module definition |  |
| `asm` | declarations | Inline assembly block |  |
| `unit` | declarations | Unit type definition |  |
| `unsafe` | declarations | Unsafe block |  |
| `shared` | declarations | GPU shared memory |  |
| `bitfield` | declarations | Packed bit struct |  |
| `kernel` | declarations | GPU kernel function |  |
| `actor` | declarations | Actor definition (concurrency) |  |
| `if` | control_flow | Conditional branch | `if x > 0: print "positive"` |
| `elif` | control_flow | Else-if branch |  |
| `else` | control_flow | Else branch |  |
| `for` | control_flow | For loop | `for item in items: print item` |
| `while` | control_flow | While loop |  |
| `match` | control_flow | Pattern match expression | `match value: case 1: ...` |
| `case` | control_flow | Match arm |  |
| `return` | control_flow | Return from function | `return result` |
| `break` | control_flow | Break out of loop |  |
| `continue` | control_flow | Skip to next iteration |  |
| `in` | control_flow | Membership / iteration operator |  |
| `loop` | control_flow | Infinite loop |  |
| `pass` | control_flow | No-op placeholder |  |
| `pass_todo` | control_flow | Unimplemented placeholder (TODO) |  |
| `pass_do_nothing` | control_flow | Intentional no-op |  |
| `pass_dn` | control_flow | Alias for pass_do_nothing |  |
| `and` | control_flow | Logical AND | `if a and b: ...` |
| `or` | control_flow | Logical OR |  |
| `not` | control_flow | Logical NOT |  |
| `self` | control_flow | Current instance reference |  |
| `is` | control_flow | Type check operator |  |
| `as` | control_flow | Type cast operator |  |
| `from` | control_flow | Import source specifier |  |
| `async` | control_flow | Async function modifier | `async fn fetch():` |
| `await` | control_flow | Await async expression |  |
| `yield` | control_flow | Yield from generator |  |
| `spawn` | control_flow | Spawn actor/task | `spawn worker()` |
| `try` | control_flow | Try block (error handling) |  |
| `catch` | control_flow | Catch block (error handling) |  |
| `throw` | control_flow | Throw exception |  |
| `with` | control_flow | Context manager block |  |
| `finally` | control_flow | Finally block (always runs) |  |
| `panic` | control_flow | Panic / unrecoverable error |  |
| `xor` | control_flow | Bitwise XOR operator |  |
| `true` | expressions | Boolean true literal | `val done = true` |
| `false` | expressions | Boolean false literal |  |
| `nil` | expressions | Null/none value | `var result = nil` |
| `super` | expressions | Parent module reference |  |
| `Some` | expressions | Option type wrapper |  |
| `Ok` | expressions | Result success wrapper |  |
| `Err` | expressions | Result error wrapper |  |
| `None` | expressions | Option empty value |  |
| `loss` | expressions | Neural network loss block |  |
| `nograd` | expressions | Disable gradient computation |  |

## Operators

| Operator | Symbol |
|----------|--------|
| plus | `+` |
| minus | `-` |
| star | `*` |
| slash | `/` |
| percent | `%` |
| star_star | `**` |
| shl | `<<` |
| shr | `>>` |
| eq | `==` |
| not_eq | `!=` |
| lt | `<` |
| gt | `>` |
| lt_eq | `<=` |
| gt_eq | `>=` |
| assign | `=` |
| plus_eq | `+=` |
| minus_eq | `-=` |
| star_eq | `*=` |
| slash_eq | `/=` |
| percent_eq | `%=` |
| walrus | `:=` |
| ampersand | `&` |
| pipe | `|` |
| caret | `^` |
| tilde | `~` |
| question | `?` |
| question_dot | `?.` |
| question_question | `??` |
| dot_question | `.?` |
| pipe_forward | `|>` |
| compose | `>>` |
| dot_dot | `..` |
| dot_dot_eq | `..=` |
| dot_plus | `.+` |
| dot_minus | `.-` |
| dot_star | `.*` |
| dot_slash | `./` |
| dot_caret | `.^` |
| at | `@` |
| triple_less | `<<<` |
| triple_greater | `>>>` |
| layer_connect | `~>` |

## Assembly Capabilities

| Capability | Kind | Description |
|------------|------|-------------|
| asm_single_line | clang-depend | Single-line asm statement (`asm "nop"`) |
| asm_indented_block | clang-depend | Indented asm block (`asm:\n    "nop"`) |
| asm_braced_block | clang-depend | Braced asm block (`asm nop`) |
| asm_match | clang-depend | Target-conditional asm (`asm match: case [x86_64]: ...`) |
| asm_assert | clang-depend | Target assertion (`asm assert [x86_64, linux]`) |
| asm_operands | compiler-depend | Register operands (`in(reg) var, out(reg) var`) |
| asm_clobbers | compiler-depend | Clobber lists (`clobbers: ["eax"]`) |
| asm_options | compiler-depend | Asm options (`options: [volatile, noreturn]`) |
| asm_register_alloc | compiler-depend | Compiler register allocation |
| asm_target_validation | compiler-depend | Per-arch instruction validation |

## Low-Level Features

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| bitfield | Packed bit-level struct declarations |
| union_type_operator | Union type operator (`A | B | C`) |
| volatile_asm | Volatile asm via C passthrough |
| volatile_attr | `@volatile` attribute for MMIO |

### Not Yet Implemented

| Feature | Status | Description |
|---------|--------|-------------|
| union_declaration | not implemented | C-style `union {}` declaration |
| packed_attr | not implemented | `@packed` attribute for struct layout |
| repr_attr | not implemented | `@repr(C)` representation attribute |
| align_attr | not implemented | `@align(N)` alignment attribute |

---

**Summary:** 70 keywords, 42 operators, 23 constructs
